title: Tomato pasta bake with Quorn™
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onions, chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 carrot, chopped finely', '300g button mushrooms, sliced', '150g spiral pasta', '500g Quorn™ mince (or any other mince meat alternative)', '1 (400g) tin tomato soup', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '4 tablespoons tomato sauce or ketchup', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '125g grated Cheddar cheese']
